item.description:
Â 

Hello Conscious Creators!

What new reality do you want to create for yourself in 2012?

Is one of those intentions a NEW Healthier YOU. Well it is time to take the first step or maybe the first leap to shaping up.

We will continue to meet weekly over the summer with lots of activities to get you moving and into shape.

Here's what's happening.

Weekly Support Groups

Saturday Morning Shape-up Walks

Bike Riding

Exercise Classes

Meditation

Yoga

This group is for everyone, whether you are looking to release some extra weight or create a healthier life style. This intimate group will consist of 10-15 Creators who really want to manifest a change in their life. Come to one or all. The more you join us, the more changes you will see.

Join us in connecting with others who enjoy exploring endless possibilities, seeing all our experiences as a valuable life lesson and creating the change we desire.

We will be meet from 7:00pm-8:30pm.

Please call me if this is your first time joining us.
See you there!

Ellen
Organizer
617-750-4830
item.how_to_find_us: We will disclose location after signing up

group.name: The North-of-Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: Using LOA to Create a Healthy You
